title: Hire Data Engineers
shortDescription: Connect with skilled data engineers who build robust data pipelines and infrastructure.
description: Our data engineers specialize in designing, building, and maintaining scalable data infrastructure. From ETL pipelines to cloud data platforms, we provide professionals who can transform your data architecture.
benefits: Expert in modern data stack (Apache Spark, Kafka, Airflow)

title: Hire Data Scientists
shortDescription: Find data scientists who turn data into actionable insights and predictive models.
description: Our data scientists are experts in statistical analysis, machine learning, and AI. They help businesses unlock the value of their data through advanced analytics and predictive modeling.
benefits: Advanced machine learning and AI expertise
Experience with ML frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, scikit-learn)

title: Analytics Consulting
shortDescription: Strategic analytics consultants to drive data-driven decision making.
description: Our analytics consultants bridge the gap between business and technology, providing strategic guidance on analytics implementation, data strategy, and organizational transformation.
